General.Name: Viagold Capital Ltd
General.Description: ViaGold Rare Earth Resources Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in processing and production of rare earth metals in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong. It also provides management and consultancy services to educational institutions; and leasing and capital financing services. The company was formerly known as ViaGOLD Capital Limited. ViaGold Rare Earth Resources Holdings Limited is based in Zhuhai, the People's Republic of China.
